seo.title: Transfert Royal Paris: Your Premium VTC Service in Paris
seo.intro: Transfert Royal Paris is your trusted partner for all your travels in the Paris region. Specializing in premium VTC transportation, we offer a private chauffeur service available 24/7 to meet all your transportation needs.

services.title: Our VTC Transfer Services in Paris
services.intro: We offer a complete range of transfer services adapted to your needs:

list.airport: Paris Airport Transfer: Shuttles to and from CDG, Orly, and Beauvais airports
list.station: Paris Train Station Transfer: Service to all Paris train stations (Gare du Nord, Gare de Lyon, Montparnasse, etc.)
list.disneyland: Disneyland Paris Transfer: Family transportation to the theme park with child seats
list.hotel: Hotel Transfer: Door-to-door service from your Parisian hotel
list.chauffeur: Private Chauffeur Paris: Chauffeur-driven service for your professional trips

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Transfert Royal Paris?
whyChoose.intro: Our VTC Paris service stands out for its excellence and reliability:

list.fixedPrices: Fixed and transparent prices: No surprises, you know the fare in advance
list.professionalDrivers: Professional chauffeurs: Experienced, polite, and punctual staff
list.premiumVehicles: Premium vehicles: Luxury sedans and vans, always clean and well-maintained
list.flightTracking: Real-time flight tracking: Automatic adjustment in case of delay
list.service247: 24/7 Service: Available day and night, even on public holidays
list.easyBooking: Easy online booking: Book in a few clicks on our website

airportTransfer.title: Paris Airport Transfer: CDG, Orly, Beauvais
airportTransfer.paragraph1: Our airport transfers guarantee you a peaceful and punctual journey. Whether you arrive at Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG), Orly Airport (ORY), or Beauvais Airport (BVA), our chauffeur welcomes you with a name sign and accompanies you to your final destination.
airportTransfer.paragraph2: Our airport shuttle service includes flight tracking, luggage assistance, and free waiting time to give you time to collect your luggage and clear customs with complete peace of mind.

booking.title: Book Your VTC Paris Online
booking.intro: VTC booking on Transfert Royal Paris is simple and fast. In just a few clicks, you can:

steps.step1: Indicate your departure point and destination
steps.step2: Choose the date and time of your transfer
steps.step3: Select the type of vehicle (sedan or van)
steps.step4: Get an instant quote with fixed price

booking.conclusion: Trust Transfert Royal Paris for all your private transportation needs in the Paris region. Contact us now to book your next VTC trip!

howFarAdvance.question: How far in advance can I book?
howFarAdvance.answer: You can book up to 6 months in advance or even same day depending on availability.

childSeats.question: Do you have child seats available?
childSeats.answer: Yes, we provide baby and child seats free of charge. Please specify when booking.

flightDelay.question: What happens if my flight is delayed?
flightDelay.answer: We monitor all flights in real-time and automatically adjust pickup time accordingly.

cancellation.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before departure. Contact us for more details.

booking.subtitle: Get an instant price for your transfer

cdg.description: The largest international airport in France, located 25km northeast of Paris. Direct transfers available 24/7.

orly.description: The second major international airport in Paris, located 13km south of Paris. Convenient access to central Paris.
orly.airlines: Transavia, easyJet, Vueling, TAP Air Portugal...

beauvais.description: Located north of Paris, serving low-cost carriers. Regular transfers to central Paris available.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your most common questions about our premium VTC service in Paris

booking.question: How can I book a VTC transfer in Paris?
booking.answer: You can book your private transfer directly on our website in just a few clicks. Choose your pickup and drop-off points, select your luxury vehicle, and confirm instantly online. We serve Paris, CDG, Orly, Beauvais, Disneyland and more.

childSeats.question: Do you offer baby or child car seats?
childSeats.answer: Yes, we provide baby seats and booster seats free of charge to ensure your children travel safely. Just let us know your needs when booking your transfer.

flightDelay.question: What if my flight is delayed?
flightDelay.answer: No worries — we track all incoming flights in real-time. Your driver will adjust the pickup time automatically and wait for you at no extra cost.

cancellation.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: You can cancel for free up to 24 hours before your scheduled pickup. For last-minute cancellations, a fee may apply depending on the time and location.

payment.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards during online booking. You can also pay the driver in cash at the end of the trip if you prefer.

luggage.question: Is there a luggage limit for the transfer?
luggage.answer: Our vehicles can accommodate standard suitcases. If you're traveling with oversized luggage, skis or many bags, contact us in advance to arrange a suitable vehicle.

success.title: Booking Confirmed!
success.subtitle: Your transfer has been successfully booked
success.name: Name:

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.emailConfirmation: You will receive a confirmation email with all details
nextSteps.driverContact: Our driver will contact you 30 minutes before departure
nextSteps.modifications: For any changes, contact us at least 48 hours in advance
